section.title: Welcome to Divvun
section.p: Divvun develops language technology tools for Sámi languages. Our tools are free, in most cases open source and available to everyone.

ul.li: Divvun Manager helps you install and automatically update spell checkers, keyboard layouts and speech synthesis for, among others, Southern, Lule and Northern Sámi on Windows and macOS.
Grammar checker that works in MS Word (also the web version) and Google Docs. It supports South, Lule. Inari, Skolt and North Sámi.
Mobile keyboards with built-in spell checker for most Sámi languages.
Online spell checker for Southern, Lule, Inari, Skolt and Northern Sámi.

section.p: More info about our tools can be found at borealium.org.
